metadata.title: CVE-2024-44985 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: prevent possible UAF in ip6_xmit()If skb_expand_head() returns NULL, skb has been freedand the associated dst/idev could also have been freed.We must use rcu_read_lock() to prevent a possible UAF.
